products.title: Collapsible Small-Pet Tunnel
products.description: Perfect for exercise and exploration, this foldable tunnel provides safe adventure for rabbits, guinea pigs, and ferrets.

products.title: Variety Chew-Toy Pack (10 pcs)
products.description: Essential dental care for small mammals. Natural wood toys help maintain healthy teeth and prevent boredom.

products.title: Plush Cuddle Cup Bed
products.description: Ultra-soft snuggle spot that provides security and warmth. Machine washable and perfectly sized for small pets.

products.title: Mini Grooming Kit
products.description: Complete grooming solution with soft brush and safe nail clippers. Keep your small pet healthy and comfortable.

products.title: Treat-Dispensing Forage Ball
products.description: Mental stimulation meets snack time! Hide treats inside for hours of engaging puzzle play.

products.title: Harness & Leash (XS)
products.description: Safe outdoor exploration for rabbits and guinea pigs. Adjustable, comfortable, and escape-proof design.

products.title: Seasonal Small-Pet Costume
products.description: Adorable 2-piece costume perfect for photos and special occasions. Gentle, comfortable fit for guinea pigs and rabbits.

products.title: Foldable Indoor/Outdoor Playpen
products.description: Expandable exercise area that sets up in seconds. Weather-resistant and perfect for supervised free-roam time.

products.title: Modular Rabbit Hutch
products.description: Stylish flat-pack home with multiple levels. Easy assembly, space-saving design perfect for modern apartments.

products.title: Starter Fun Pack Bundle
products.description: Everything you need to get started! Includes tunnel, chew toys, and treat dispenser. Perfect for new pet parents.
